synopsis: My super-energetic childhood friend Himawari and the beautiful student council president Cosmos have asked me out on a date? Wait, why am I giving them romantic advice? What about my harem comedy? It's time to witness the end of the peaceful rom-com.

Who would've thought my dream of a high school life would run off the rails and go down a thorny path so quickly, all because of an improbable "double confession of love"? Oh, hello. I'm Joro. Don't worry! I haven't given up on the idea of a "harem high school life" just yet.
It's over. It's all over. One misunderstanding led to the next and now both Himawari and Cosmos are disgusted with me.

With the "mastermind" exposed and the misunderstandings about my "evil deeds" cleared up to the student body's satisfaction, my peaceful everyday life resumes. But there's still something I haven't gotten back!

The exciting springtime of my life! I'm surrounded by beautiful giggling, jiggling girls! Wait, what the hell is this? Hey, Asunaro, you're with the newspaper club! What's this about me being the "enemy of all women" and going out with Himawari, Cosmos, and Pansy at the same time?

If there is a "god of inconvenience," he must love me! One minor slip-up and the "Three-timing Joro" article was circulated all over the school! I was back in the pit of despair when who should yank me out but the author of the article herself, Asunaro of the newspaper club.
At last, the time has come! With the Flower Dance accomplished, we get a deserving day off. And there's only one place to go! That's right, a pool!
"From now on I'll do everything I can for you with all my heart." That's what the new girl at school said to me! Finally a kind girl appears before me… Yeah, right!

I start working at Tsubaki's shop so I can afford to buy Pansy another copy of her book! It's rough since I'm not used to the job, but at this rate, I should be able to manage… Ahhh! I messed up big time!
